## `SetBarChartBarEffect`

Sets how bars should be drawn within the various bar charts.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetBarChartBarEffect(BoxEffect effect)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`BoxEffect`](#boxeffect) effect | The effect to apply to the bars. |
